TestSuite: Fetch And Link Merchant Details based on case number

TC_01.TestCaseName: TC_01 It should receive 200 and should link merchant details based on the merchant matched caseNumber @Smoke @Sanity @Regression @ServiceCaseManagerAPI @Smoke-Managed-Dev

TC_02.TestCaseName: TC_02 It should receive 200 and should link merchant details based on the merchant match failed caseNumber @Regression @ServiceCaseManagerAPI @Regression-Managed-Dev

TC_03.TestCaseName: TC_03 It should receive 200 and should link merchant details based on the merchant matched caseNumber @Regression @ServiceCaseManagerAPI @Regression-Managed-Dev

TC_04.TestCaseName: TC_04 It should receive 200 and should link merchant details based on the merchant matched caseNumber @Regression @ServiceCaseManagerAPI @Regression-Managed-Dev

TC_05.TestCaseName: TC_05 It should throw 400 and should not link merchant details @Regression @ServiceCaseManagerAPI @Regression-Managed-Dev
